page.title: 19 WHERE I LIVE
page.content: I live in number 22,Prince Street, a detatched house, and{I have been {living there for 11 years. The house has 7 rooms. There are 3 bedrooms and a room for all our toys and a bathroom. We have two lawns out the front and two little lawns out the back. There is a{Youth Centre}by{Pontypool {Park}where you can play football, snooker and netball. On a Tuesday they have an inflatable which costs 20p. Also in Pontypool we have a{Leisure {Centre}where you can go swimming and go to Junior Rec. At Pontypool Park there's a{rugby {pitch}for{Pontypool Rugby Club.}We also have a putting game and a tennis court. We have a ski slope too. There is a river in the park called Afon Lwyd. We also have a Shopping Centre.
